mrpac.DICOM_Networking.verifyEcho

mrpac.DICOM_Networking.verifyEcho(scpAET, aet, ip, port)

Verifies whether a DICOM association can be established given an AE (Application Entity) title, IP address and port number of a peer AE.

Parameters:

  • scpAET (str) – A calling AE title to use.

  • aet (str) – The AE title of the peer AE.

  • ip (str) – The IPv4 address of the peer AE.

  • port (Union[str, int]) – The port number of the peer AE.

Returns:

A DICOM response status as a string or Failed if association could not be established or no response was received.

Return type:

str
